items.name: measure
items.title: Measure Utilities
items.description: Utility functions for measuring monospace character width and column count in the DOM. Includes measureChars, measureCharWidth, and observeResize for responsive ASCII layouts.

items.name: ascii-card
items.title: ASCII Card
items.description: A box-drawing card component with optional title, content, and single or double border styles using Unicode box-drawing characters.

items.name: ascii-input
items.title: ASCII Input
items.description: A text input field styled with ASCII box-drawing characters, featuring a blinking cursor, configurable label, placeholder, and single or double border styles.

items.name: ascii-table
items.title: ASCII Table
items.description: A data table rendered with Unicode box-drawing characters (double borders). Supports headers, rows, and auto-calculated or custom column widths.

items.name: ascii-3d-renderer
items.title: ASCII 3D Renderer
items.description: Renders 3D geometry or GLTF models as live ASCII art using Three.js AsciiEffect. Supports torus knot, sphere, cube, torus, cylinder, and custom model URLs with orbit controls.

items.name: bar-chart
items.title: Bar Chart
items.description: An animated ASCII bar chart using █ block characters with sinusoidal height animation. Configurable width, height, bar count, and speed.

items.name: bouncing-banner
items.title: Bouncing Banner
items.description: An animated banner with ░█ block characters bouncing across a text label. Configurable text, width, and animation speed.

items.name: dot-matrix
items.title: Dot Matrix
items.description: Animates dot characters (.) in ASCII art with a flowing .░▒▓ density effect using sine/cosine noise. Pass multi-line text with dots to animate.

items.name: gradient-banner
items.title: Gradient Banner
items.description: An animated banner with a ▓▒░ gradient trail following a bouncing █ block around a text label. Configurable text, width, and speed.

items.name: nav-menu
items.title: Nav Menu
items.description: A navigation menu using tree-drawing characters (├ └) with linked labels and descriptions. Uses Next.js Link for routing.

items.name: plasma-orb
items.title: Plasma Orb
items.description: An animated plasma orb effect using ░▒▓█ density characters with radial sine wave patterns. Configurable width, height, and speed.

items.name: progress-bar
items.title: Progress Bar
items.description: An ASCII progress bar using █░ characters with optional label and fill animation. Configurable value, max, width, and animation speed.

items.name: sine-wave
items.title: Sine Wave Chart
items.description: An animated sine wave visualization using █ block characters. Configurable width, height, and animation speed.

items.name: status-panel
items.title: Status Panel
items.description: A system status panel with double-border box drawing, title, and key-value entries. Configurable title, entries object, and width.

items.name: theme-switcher
items.title: Theme Switcher
items.description: A boxed theme control panel for switching colour themes (M/G/R/B/O) and day/night modes. Requires ThemeProvider from @/lib/theme-context.

items.name: inline-theme-switcher
items.title: Inline Theme Switcher
items.description: A compact inline theme switcher for colour themes and day/night mode. Renders as a single line. Requires ThemeProvider from @/lib/theme-context.

items.name: ascii-tabs
items.title: ASCII Tabs
items.description: A tabbed interface component using ASCII box-drawing characters with active tab indication, keyboard navigation, and optional double borders.
